title: Vacation Rentals "By the Sea" - Bad Zwischenahn
wohnzimmer_01_p: The spacious living room invites you to relax. Thanks to the large windows, you can enjoy a bright, open ambiance with a stunning view of the lake. Here, you can lean back with a cup of coffee, dream, and simply let your mind wander. For your safety and the protection of your valuables, a safe is installed in the living area.
wohnzimmer_02_p: The adjoining kitchen corner offers everything you need for preparing your meals. Equipped with a refrigerator, a four-burner stove, a dishwasher, a microwave, an oven, as well as practical appliances like a coffee machine, a kettle, an egg cooker, and a toaster, you are well-equipped for comfortable cooking and enjoyment.
wohnzimmer_03_p: In the dining area, you will find a cozy dining table with three chairs, perfect for shared meals. A movable counter between the living and dining areas offers additional flexibility. Entertainment is also taken care of: a stereo system with FM radio, CD, and cassette player is available, as well as cable TV, books, magazines, and board games. Here, you can enjoy your meals while also being entertained.
schlafzimmer_01_p: The bed­room impresses with its magnificent view of the lake, which you can enjoy directly from the cozy double bed. The large windows let in plenty of natural light, creating a calm and relaxed atmosphere. Equipped with separate mattresses and fresh bed linen, the bed offers optimal comfort for restful nights.
schlafzimmer_02_p: The room is furnished with high-quality wooden furniture, including a spacious wardrobe and a practical dresser. The two bedside tables next to the bed provide convenient storage for your personal items. For added comfort and flexibility, there are two chairs that can be used for sitting or laying down clothes.
schlafzimmer_03_p: In addition to the cozy furnishings, the bedroom features a second television located on the wardrobe. This allows you to comfortably enjoy your favorite shows from bed. The harmonious combination of natural wood, warm lighting, and the wonderful view of the lake makes this bedroom a place of relaxation and rejuvenation.
grundriss_01_p: Both apartments are located right next to each other on the 4th floor and are accessible by elevator. There is a separate entrance that allows for barrier-free access to the apartment. The 50 square meters are divided into a living room with kitchenette, a bedroom with a double bed, a shower, a hallway, a storage room, and a 6-meter long covered balcony (loggia). The apartment is fully equipped. If anything is missing, I am happy to provide assistance.
